markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Elemental Bulwark](/Feats.aspx?ID=2584) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Suli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=310" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 111 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
An enemy is about to damage you with cold, electricity, or fire, or with a spell that has the [air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5), [earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=55), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), or [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165) trait.

</column>

---

You call upon the corresponding elements of your suli heritage to resist the effect. You gain resistance 5 against the triggering damage.

<title level="2">Elemental Bulwark leads to...</title>
[Improved Elemental Bulwark](/Feats.aspx?ID=2589)
name: Elemental Bulwark
